Requirement_Description: Application header with branding, user profile, and global actions
Acceptance_Criteria: Header visible on all screens; Logo clickable; User menu accessible; Help button opens panel; Global search functional
Notes: CRITICAL - Application looks unfinished without header

Requirement_Description: Correct application name and branding throughout
Acceptance_Criteria: All instances show correct app name; Consistent branding; Logo displayed correctly
Notes: CRITICAL - Wrong name shows 'H2 Tank Designer'

Requirement_Description: Auto-save all user work to prevent data loss
Acceptance_Criteria: Work auto-saved every 30s; Visual indicator shows save status; Recovery after browser close; Manual save option
Notes: CRITICAL - Users lose all work on refresh

Requirement_Description: Session recovery after crash or accidental close
Acceptance_Criteria: Prompt to recover previous session; Last 5 sessions stored; Clear recovery option

Requirement_Description: Undo/redo system for all user actions
Acceptance_Criteria: Ctrl+Z undoes last action; Ctrl+Y redoes; 50+ action history; Visual history panel available

UI_Element_Needed: Help button in header + F1 shortcut
Acceptance_Criteria: F1 opens help panel; Help icon in header works; HelpProvider mounted in Layout
Notes: CRITICAL - Help system exists but not integrated

Requirement_Description: Context-sensitive help icons on all form fields
UI_Element_Needed: HelpIcon component next to each input
Acceptance_Criteria: Every input has help icon; Clicking shows relevant help; Tooltips explain field purpose
Notes: HIGH - No contextual help on forms

Acceptance_Criteria: Tab navigates all elements; Focus visible; Escape closes modals; Enter activates buttons
Common shortcuts documented; Customizable bindings; Shortcut hints in tooltips
All interactive elements have ARIA labels; Dynamic content announced; Images have alt text
Errors contained to component; Friendly error message shown; Recovery option provided; Error logged
Notes: CRITICAL - JS errors crash entire app

Acceptance_Criteria: Technical errors translated; Suggested actions provided; Support contact shown; Retry available
Skeletons match expected content; Animate to indicate loading; 200ms delay before showing
Progress bar shows percentage; Time remaining estimated; Cancel option for long ops

Requirement_Description: Dark mode support with system preference detection
Acceptance_Criteria: Toggle in settings; System preference detected; Theme persisted; All components styled for both
Layout adapts to 1024px; No horizontal scroll; Touch-friendly on tablet; Sidebar collapses

Requirement_Description: Chat panel properly scrolls and expands
Acceptance_Criteria: Chat scrolls to latest message; Expandable/collapsible; Resize handle works; History preserved

Requirement_Description: Requirements version history with diff view
Acceptance_Criteria: Save versions manually; View version history; Compare versions; Restore old version

Requirement_Description: Predefined requirement templates for common applications
Acceptance_Criteria: 5+ templates available; Quick-fill from template; Edit after selection
Each field shows confidence %; Low confidence highlighted; Explanation available
Red/yellow/green status per field; Validation rules explained; Auto-fix suggestions
Export to PDF; Export to Excel; Export to JSON; Include all parsed data
Import from Excel; Import from JSON; Validate on import; Map columns
3D rendering with rotation; Axis selection dropdowns; Interactive point selection

Requirement_Description: Custom axis selection for Pareto plot
Acceptance_Criteria: All metrics available as axes; Save axis preferences; Swap axes easily
Filter by any metric range; Filter by compliance status; Clear filters button

Requirement_Description: Export selected designs from Pareto chart
Acceptance_Criteria: Export selected designs; Choose export format; Include comparison data
Click two points for distance; Click three points for angle; Measure radius; Show units

Acceptance_Criteria: Dome profile matches isotensoid curve; Parameters displayed; Equation shown
Thread profile visible; Thread spec shown; Cutaway reveals threads
One-click standard views; Keyboard shortcuts (1-6); Smooth transition animation
Click cube faces for views; Drag for rotation; Shows current orientation
Key dimensions shown; Tolerances displayed; Click to edit; Toggle visibility
Export current view; Choose resolution; Transparent background option; Add title
Play/pause animation; Scrub timeline; Speed control; Layer labels
Two viewers side by side; Synchronized rotation; Difference highlighting
Better values highlighted green; Worse values highlighted red; Difference percentage shown
Select which metrics to compare; Save metric preferences; Show/hide columns
Add up to 10 designs; Remove designs; Scrollable table
Color map of failure index; Values 0-1 shown; Critical regions highlighted
Fiber/matrix tension/compression modes; Per-layer values; Dominant mode shown
Stress per layer shown; Graph along thickness; Select layer to highlight
SCF at dome transition; SCF at boss; Values and locations shown
Define path on geometry; Plot stress along path; Export path data
Each clause listed; Pass/fail per clause; Evidence link per clause; Notes field
Click clause to see supporting analysis; Link to specific results; Timestamp
List all non-compliant items; Suggested actions; Export to PDF
Request waiver for non-compliance; Justification field; Approval workflow
Show surrogate prediction; Show FEA result; Calculate error; Confidence interval
Green/red/yellow status; Criteria shown; Details expandable
Generate valid STEP AP214; Progress indicator; File size shown; Validate before download

Select report sections; Reorder sections; Add custom text; Preview before export
Markers at sensor locations; Click marker for details; Toggle visibility
Set alert thresholds; Email notification config; Severity levels

Requirement_Description: Parse natural language requirements into structured constraints
Acceptance_Criteria: Input parsed within 2s; All fields populated; Confidence shown; Edit capability
Pressure type identified; Conversion shown; User can override
Relevant standards identified; Requirements linked; Version shown

Requirement_Description: Calculate derived requirements (test pressure burst pressure cycle life)
Acceptance_Criteria: All derived values calculated; Formulas shown on hover; Units correct
Temp range populated; Source shown; Override possible
Current step highlighted; Completed steps marked; Click to navigate
Back button works; Forward enabled after back; State preserved
Data saved between steps; Refresh preserves state; Clear option available

Requirement_Description: Conversational requirements gathering with LLM dialogue
Acceptance_Criteria: Multi-turn conversation; Context preserved; Follow-up questions generated
5+ turn context; Clarification prompts; Progressive refinement

Requirement_Description: Undo/redo capability for user configuration actions
Acceptance_Criteria: Ctrl+Z works; 50+ action history; Visual indicator

Requirement_Description: Auto-save with conflict resolution for concurrent edits
Acceptance_Criteria: Auto-save every 30s; Conflict detection; Merge/overwrite choice

Requirement_Description: Session persistence across browser tabs with sync
Acceptance_Criteria: Tabs sync state; No conflicts; Close warning if unsaved

Requirement_Description: Keyboard shortcuts for power users with customization
Acceptance_Criteria: Common shortcuts work; Help overlay (?) shows shortcuts; Customizable

Requirement_Description: Context-sensitive help system with inline tooltips
Acceptance_Criteria: HelpIcon on all fields; F1 opens panel; Tooltips everywhere
